1.新增表
-- auto-generated definition
create table hrm_position
(
  id          varchar(50)  not null
  comment '主键'
    primary key,
  name        varchar(100) null
  comment '岗位名称',
  type        varchar(50)  null
  comment '类型',
  mark        varchar(100) null
  comment '备注',
  dr          char         null,
  create_by   varchar(50)  null,
  update_by   varchar(50)  null,
  create_time datetime     null,
  update_time datetime     null,
  code        varchar(100) null
);



-- auto-generated definition
create table hrm_position_type
(
  id          varchar(50)  not null
  comment '主键'
    primary key,
  ptname      varchar(100) null
  comment '名称',
  mark        varchar(100) null
  comment '备注',
  dr          char         null,
  create_by   varchar(50)  null,
  update_by   varchar(50)  null,
  create_time datetime     null,
  update_time datetime     null
);



-- auto-generated definition
create table contract
(
  id                  varchar(50)    not null
    primary key,
  title               varchar(100)   null,
  about               varchar(100)   null,
  status              varchar(50)    null,
  type                varchar(50)    null,
  direction           varchar(50)    null,
  files               varchar(500)   null,
  effectivedate       date           null,
  closingdate         date           null,
  belongcomp          varchar(50)    null,
  belongcompname      varchar(50)    null,
  belongpart          varchar(50)    null,
  belongpartname      varchar(50)    null,
  totalamount         decimal(10, 2) null,
  firstparty          varchar(50)    null,
  firstpartyname      varchar(100)   null,
  firstpartyuser      varchar(50)    null,
  firstpartycontact   varchar(50)    null,
  secondparty         varchar(50)    null,
  secondpartyname     varchar(100)   null,
  secondpartyuser     varchar(50)    null,
  secondpartycontact  varchar(50)    null,
  relatedparty        varchar(500)   null,
  relatedpartyname    varchar(100)   null,
  relatedpartyuser    varchar(50)    null,
  relatedpartycontact varchar(50)    null,
  reviewer            varchar(50)    null,
  mark                varchar(100)   null,
  dr                  char           null,
  create_by           varchar(50)    null,
  update_by           varchar(50)    null,
  create_time         datetime       null,
  update_time         datetime       null,
  busuuid             varchar(50)    null
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table contract_entity
(
  id          varchar(50)  not null
    primary key,
  code        varchar(100) null,
  name        varchar(100) null,
  profile     varchar(200) null,
  bank        varchar(100) null,
  bankaccount varchar(100) null,
  website     varchar(100) null,
  addr        varchar(100) null,
  bus         varchar(100) null,
  mark        varchar(100) null,
  dr          char         null,
  create_by   varchar(50)  null,
  update_by   varchar(50)  null,
  create_time datetime     null,
  update_time datetime     null,
  contact     varchar(100) null
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table contract_entity_contacts
(
  id          varchar(50)  not null
    primary key,
  code        varchar(100) null,
  entityid    varchar(50)  null,
  name        varchar(100) null,
  sex         varchar(100) null,
  mail        varchar(100) null,
  mobile      varchar(100) null,
  mark        varchar(100) null,
  dr          char         null,
  create_by   varchar(50)  null,
  update_by   varchar(50)  null,
  create_time datetime     null,
  update_time datetime     null
);

create table doc_mgr
(
  id          varchar(50)   not null
    primary key,
  name        varchar(100)  null,
  type        varchar(100)  null,
  ct          varchar(1000) null,
  files       varchar(500)  null,
  mark        varchar(100)  null,
  dr          char          null,
  create_by   varchar(50)   null,
  update_by   varchar(50)   null,
  create_time datetime      null,
  update_time datetime      null
);
